body_html:
@mrry The problem is not that people can't figure out what the error means. If the docs (https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.5/install/install_linux) specify that TF 1.5 supports CUDA 8, then either the docs are wrong or the code is, not people's expectations.

@gunan this hasn't been pushed to the website for 1.5 (its fixed for 1.6). I just ran into the same error for 1.5 with Ubuntu 16.04/cuda 8/cudnn 6 .
